jobs.title: Software Developer
description: I drove the adoption of Agile methodologies and CI/CD pipelines, streamlining development processes and significantly improving deployment efficiency and code quality. A key highlight of my work was leading the redesign of a weather data API to support international weather stations, expanding the company's reach and increasing the station network by over 100%.

I also spearheaded critical enhancements, such as an offline synchronization feature for a progressive web app, reducing bug complaints by 90%, and upgrading a multi-tenanted authentication system for improved scalability and observability. Throughout my work, Iâ€™ve collaborated closely with designers and cross-functional teams to ensure seamless, high-quality feature integration.

jobs.title: Software Developer Intern
description: I played a key role in developing and maintaining a web application, implementing both front-end and back-end features that improved stability and user experience, leading to a 300% increase in the user base. A major achievement was developing a complex mapping feature using Mapbox, replacing the legacy version for a significantly improved user experience.

Beyond development, I worked closely with designers to refine the application's visual elements, ensuring a seamless and responsive design across all devices. Additionally, I conducted thorough maintenance and debugging, resolving critical issues that enhanced the application's overall reliability.
